content.rendered:
<script>
		/* disabling for now
		let getHead = document.querySelector('.main-header.movement');
		if(getHead){
			getHead.addEventListener("mousemove",function(event){
				document.querySelector('.main-header .left-text svg').style.transform = "translate(calc(-52% + "+ event.offsetX/50 +"px), calc(-59% + "+ event.offsetY/50 +"px)) scale(2.1)";
			});
		} */
	</script>

	<style>
		.main-header{padding:10em 0 5em;background-size:cover;background-position:top center;position: relative;color: white;z-index:0;overflow:hidden;}
		.main-header h1, .main-header h2{margin:0;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:4rem;}
		.main-header h2{text-align:right;}
		.main-header h1 span{display:block;}
		.main-header .content-width{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-content: center;}
		.main-header .content-width > div{align-self:center;}
		.main-header .content-width > div:first-child{width:55%;}

		.page-id-8095 .main-header{padding:8em 0 6em 0 ;}
		.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width{display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap;}
		.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width .left-text{width:33.33%}
		.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width .right-text{width:66.66%;}
		.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width h1{text-transform: none; padding-right:25px;     line-height: 1.1em; font-size: 3rem;}
		.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper .gform_footer{margin-top:0; padding-bottom:0; padding:0; width:33.33%;}
		.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper .gform_body{width:66.66%;}
		.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper form{display: flex;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 ul{display: flex;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 li{width:50%; padding:0; margin:0 !important;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 li div{margin:0;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 label{display: none;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 input{width:calc(100% - 5px); padding:7px;}
		.page-id-8095 #gform_49 input#gform_submit_button_49{background-color: #a3294c; border:none; color:white; text-transform: uppercase; font-size:15px; padding:10px; margin:0;}

		.main-header .content-width .image-wrapper{height:500px;}
		.main-header .content-width > .image-wrapper{display: flex; align-items: flex-end;}
		.main-header .content-width > div:last-child{width:40%;position:relative;z-index:0;}
		.main-header .right-text p{text-align:left; margin:0; padding:0;}
		.main-header p{font-size:.9em;}
		.main-header a{color:white;}
		@media(max-width:1000px){
			.main-header h1, .main-header h2{font-size:12vw;}
			.main-header .content-width > div:first-child{height:auto;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header{padding:25px;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width .left-text, .page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width .right-text{width:100%;}
			.page-id-8095 form{margin:0; max-width:100%;}
			.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper{margin-bottom:0;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width h1{padding:100px 0 0 0;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width h1 br{display: none;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header{background-position:left center;}
		}
		@media(max-width:700px){
			.main-header{padding:4em 0 3em;}
			.main-header .content-width{flex-direction:column;}
			.main-header .content-width > div{width:100% !important;}
			.main-header h1, .main-header h2, .main-header p, .main-header .left-text, .main-header .right-text, .main-header .right-text p{text-align:center;}
			.page-id-8095 .main-header .content-width h1{padding-top:0; font-size:2em;}
			.page-id-8095 #gform_49 li, .page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper .gform_footer{width:100%; padding-bottom:5px;}
			.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper form, .page-id-8095 #gform_49 ul{flex-direction:column;}
			.page-id-8095 form{margin:0 auto; }
			.page-id-8095 .gform_wrapper .gform_body{width:100%;}
		}
		@media(max-width:550px){
			.page-id-8095 .main-header{background-position:left 15% center;}
		}
		@media(max-width:480px){
			.page-id-8095 .main-header{background-position:left 25% center;}
		}
		.main-header .backgrounds{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;top:0;left:0;z-index: -1;transform: skew(-13deg, 0) scaleX(1.25);}
		.main-header.no-background .backgrounds{display:none;}
		.main-header .backgrounds > div:first-child{background:rgba(20, 25, 39, .65);width:60%;height:100%;animation:bgflicker 45s linear infinite;}
		@keyframes bgflicker{
			50.15%{background:rgba(255, 255, 255, .85);}
			50.20%{background:rgba(255, 255, 255, .15);}
			50.25%{background:rgba(255, 255, 255, .45);}
			50%,52%{background:rgba(20, 25, 39, .55);}
		}
		.main-header .backgrounds > div:last-child{width:50%;height:100%;position:relative;overflow:hidden;}
		.main-header .backgrounds.dual-tri > div:last-child{left:15%;}
		.main-header .bg-1-tri, .main-header .bg-2-tri, .main-header .bg-3-tri{animation:headertri 20s infinite;transform-origin:50%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;}
		.main-header .bg-1-tri{background:rgba(65, 22, 127, .75);}
		.main-header .bg-2-tri{background:rgba(68, 24, 132, .6);transform:rotate(26deg) translate(14%, 27%) skew(10deg, 10deg);}
		.main-header .bg-3-tri{background:rgba(46, 13, 94, .6);transform:rotate(91deg) translate(-35%, -34%) skew(19deg, 10deg);}
		@keyframes headertri{
			25%{transform-origin:48%;}
			75%{transform-origin:52%;}
		}
		.main-header .backgrounds.dual-tri > div:first-child{width:50%;height:100%;position:relative;overflow:hidden;transform: rotate(180deg) skew(24deg, 0deg);background:none;left:-15%;}
		.main-header .bg-4-tri, .main-header .bg-5-tri, .main-header .bg-6-tri{animation:headertri2 20s infinite;transform-origin:50%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;}
		.main-header .bg-4-tri{background:rgba(65, 22, 127, .75);}
		.main-header .bg-5-tri{background:rgba(68, 24, 132, .6);transform:rotate(26deg) translate(14%, 27%) skew(10deg, 10deg);}
		.main-header .bg-6-tri{background:rgba(46, 13, 94, .6);transform:rotate(91deg) translate(-35%, -34%) skew(19deg, 10deg);}
		@keyframes headertri2{
			25%{transform-origin:48%;}
			75%{transform-origin:52%;}
		}

		/*button*/
		.post-8337 .seo-first .outlined-btn.red.lets-talk{color:#a0284b; margin-top:25px;} 
		
		/* Home Styles */
		.main-header.home{color:white;padding:5em 0 0;overflow:hidden;background-position:top center;background-size:cover;text-align:center;position:relative;z-index:0;text-transform:uppercase;}
		.main-header.home h1 span{font-size:1.7em;}
		.main-header.home .backgrounds{transform: initial;}
		.main-header.home .left-text, .main-header.home .right-text{font-weight:bold;}
		.main-header.home .left-text{font-size:2.25em;text-align: left;z-index:1;}
		.main-header.home .left-text span{font-size:5.25em;position:relative;display: block;text-align: right;line-height: .7em;margin-top:.1em;}
		.main-header.home .left-text svg{height:54%; font-size:5em;position:absolute;top: 50%;left: 50%;transform: translate(-51%, -71%) scale(2.1);transition:transform .1s;}
		.main-header.home .right-text{font-size:4em;text-align: right;line-height: 1em;z-index:3;letter-spacing: 2px;}
		.main-header.home .right-text strong{display: block;line-height: 1em;}
		.main-header.home .right-text span:not(.vd-span){font-size:.3em;display: block;line-height: 1em;letter-spacing:13px;}
		
		.main-header.home .outlined-btn.mobile{display: none;}
		.main-header.home .outlined-btn{color:white;font-weight:bold;left: 40%;font-size:1.7rem;line-height:1.5rem;top:120%;}
		
		/*.main-header.home .video-btn svg{width:65px;height:65px;border-radius:50%;background:rgba(65, 22, 127, .85);position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);padding:.5em;} */
		
		@media(min-width:950px) and (max-width:1243px){.main-header.home .left-text span{font-size:16vw;}}
		@media(min-width:950px) and (max-width:1107px){.main-header.home .right-text{font-size:5.8vw;}}
		@media(min-width:951px){
			.main-header.home{height:100vh;max-height:1000px;}
			.main-header.home img{position: absolute;bottom: 0;left: 50%;transform: translate(-50%);z-index:2;height:calc(100vh - 5em);max-height:1000px;width:auto;}
			.main-header.home .left-text, .main-header.home .right-text{position:absolute;}
			.main-header.home .left-text{top:50%;left:25px;transform:translate(0,-50%);}
			.main-header.home .right-text{top: calc(50% + 14vh);right:25px;transform:translate(0,-50%);}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds{z-index:-1;}
		}
		@media(max-width:950px){
			.main-header.home .left-text svg{height:133%;}
			.main-header.home{height:auto;padding-top:1em;}
			.main-header.home img{position: relative;z-index: 1;max-width: 90%;}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds{flex-direction:column;z-index:unset;}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds > div{width:100%;}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds > div:first-child{z-index:-1;position: relative;}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds > div:last-child{z-index:1;height: 43%;width: 100%;position: absolute;bottom: -19%;transform: rotate(-17deg) translate(0, -9%) scale(1.75);}
			.main-header.home .left-text{z-index:2;position: relative;font-size: 60px;text-align:center;margin-top: -10em;}
			.main-header.home .backgrounds{top:-4em;}
			.main-header.home .left-text span{font-size:34vw;text-align:center;}
			.main-header.home .left-text a{bottom: -246%;top: initial;left: 50%;transform: translate(-50%);}
			.main-header.home .right-text{position:relative;text-align:center;font-size:60px;}
			.main-header.home .right-text span{letter-spacing: 12px;font-weight: 100;margin:.75em 0 1em 0;}
			.main-header.home .right-text strong{font-size: inherit;}
			.main-header.home .left-text svg{font-size:24px;animation:svgShake 10s linear infinite;}
			.main-header.home .left-text svg text{font-size: .1em;}
			@keyframes svgShake{
				0%,94.5%,100%{transform:translate(-53%, -66%);}
				95%,96.5%,98%,99.5%{transform:translate(-54%, -67%);opacity:1;}
				95.5%,97%,98.5%{transform:translate(-53%, -66%);opacity:1;}
				96%,97.5%,99%{transform:translate(-54%, -67%);opacity:1;}
			}
			.main-header.home .outlined-btn.desktop{display: none;}
			.main-header.home .outlined-btn.mobile{display: block; position: relative; max-width: 250px; margin: 0 auto; left: 0; right: 0;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:500px){
			.main-header.home .left-text, .main-header.home .right-text{font-size:45px;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:400px){
			.main-header.home .left-text, .main-header.home .right-text{font-size:35px;}
		}
		
		/* About Styles */
		.main-header.about{background-color:#3E1C71;background-size:80%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position: -35% 5%; position: relative;}
		.main-header.about .backgrounds > div:first-child{background:none;animation:none;}
		.main-header.about .content-width > div:last-child{text-align:center;}
		.main-header.about h1{text-shadow:-3px 5px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.6);}
		.main-header.about h1, .main-header.about h2{font-size:4.25em;}
		.main-header.about img{max-width:100%;max-height:300px;}
		.main-header.about p{font-size:1em;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing: 1px;}
		.main-header.about a{font-size:1.3em;color:white !important;}
		@media(max-width:1250px){
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about{background-size: 100%; background-position: -275px 0;}
		}
		@media(max-width:1080px){
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about{background-position: -225px 0;}
			.main-header.about h1, .main-header.about h2{font-size:3.25em;}
		}
		@media(max-width:960px) and (min-width:700px){
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about{background-position: -175px 0; padding:150px 0;}
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about h1, .page-id-596 .main-header.about h2{font-size:2.25em;}
			.page-id-596 .main-header .content-width > .left-text, 
			.page-id-596 .main-header .content-width > .right-text{position: absolute !important; bottom:25px;}
			.page-id-596 .main-header .content-width > .right-text{right: 25px;}
			.page-id-596 .main-header .content-width > .left-text{left:25px;}
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about .left-text p{height:0; padding:0;}
		}
		@media(max-width:700px){
			.main-header.about,
			.page-id-596 .main-header.about{background-size:cover;background-position:center;}
			.main-header.about:before{content:"";top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;background:rgba(0, 0, 0, .35);box-shadow:inset 0px -15px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.5);}
			.main-header.about *{text-shadow:-3px 5px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.6);}
			.main-header.about img{margin-top:.5em;}
			.main-header.about h2{margin-top:.25em;}
			.main-header.about h1, .main-header.about h2{font-size:13vw;z-index:1;position:relative;}
			.main-header.about h1 ~ p{display:none;}
			.main-header.about .backgrounds{display:none;}
		}
		
		/* Services Styles */
		body.page-id-7369 .masthead, body.page-id-3730 .masthead{background:black;}
		.main-header.services{background:black;padding:0;}
		.main-header.services h1{font-size:3rem;}
		.main-header.services h1 span{font-size:5rem;}
		.main-header.services h2{font-size:5rem;}
		.main-header.services p{font-size:.9em;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase;}
		
		/* Contact Styles */
		.main-header.contact .content-width > div:last-child{width:44%;}
		.main-header.contact h1{font-size:3em;}
		.main-header.contact h1 span{font-size:3em;}
		.main-header.contact h2{font-size:4em;}
		.main-header.contact h2 a{color:white;}
		.main-header.contact img{max-width:100%;width:auto;max-height:100%;height:auto;position:absolute;left:50%;bottom:0;transform:translate(-50%, 0%);}
		.main-header.contact p{font-size:1em;display:block;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:100;letter-spacing:2px;}
		@media all and (min-width:701px){
			.page-id-26 .main-header.contact h2{font-size: 4em; position: absolute; width: 475px; right: 0; top: -65px;}
		}
		@media(max-width:700px){
			.main-header.contact{padding:14em 0 0;}
			.main-header.contact .content-width > div{z-index:1;}
			.main-header.contact h1{font-size:2em;}
			.main-header.contact h1 span{font-size:2em;}
			.main-header.contact h2{font-size:3em;}
			.main-header.contact img{margin-top:.5em;height: auto;}
			.main-header.contact h1, .main-header.contact h2, .main-header.contact p{text-shadow:3px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.25);text-align:center;}
		}
		@media(max-width:380px){
			.main-header.contact{padding:8em 0 0;}
			.main-header.contact h2{font-size: 30px; line-height: normal;}
		}
		
		/* Portfolio Styles */
		.main-header.portfolio{background:#441884;}
		.main-header.portfolio h1, .main-header.portfolio p{text-align:center;}

		/*sitemap*/
		body.page-id-3730 .content-width{padding-top:100px;}
		body.page-id-3730 .entry-content ul li:before{left:0;}
		body.page-id-3730 .entry-content ul li{padding-left:25px;}
		body.page-id-3730 .entry-content ul .sitemap_posts > li{padding-left:0;}
		body.page-id-3730 .entry-content ul .sitemap_posts > li:before{display: none;}
		@media all and (max-width:1000px){
			body.page-id-3730 .content-width{padding-top:0px;}	
		}
		
		/* Testimonials Styles */
		.main-header.testi{padding:11em 0 5em;background-image:url(https://niftymarketing.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/testi-header1.jpg);}
		.main-header.testi h1{font-size:2.5rem;}
		.main-header.testi h1 span{font-size:1.55em;}
		.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child:before{content:"";width:56%;position: absolute;top:50%;right: -6%;border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.25);border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.25);border-left: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.25);height: 120%;z-index: -1;transform: translate(0,-50%);}
		.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i{position: absolute;top:50%;right: -19.75%;transform:translate(0,-50%) rotate(90deg);font-style:normal;font-weight:100;font-size:.6em;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:6px;}
		.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i:before, .main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i:after{content: "";width:56%;height:1px;position:absolute;background:rgba(255,255,255,.25);top:50%;}
		.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i:before{left: 105%;}
		.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i:after{right:105%;}
		.main-header.testi p strong{display:block;line-height:.8em;margin-top:1.25em;font-size:1.2em;}
		.main-header.testi p span{font-size:.9em;}
		@media(max-width:1000px){
			.main-header.testi .content-width{flex-direction:column;}
			.main-header.testi .content-width > div:first-child{width:100% !important;}
			.main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child:before, .main-header.testi .content-width > div:last-child a > i{display:none;}
		}
		
		/* Main Services Styles */
		.main-services{background-position:center bottom;}
		.main-services:before{content:"";top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;background:rgba(0, 0, 0, .35);box-shadow:inset 0px -15px 20px rgba(0,0,0,.5);}
		.main-services .content-width > div:last-child{width:100%;}
		.main-services h1{text-transform:initial;line-height:.8em;}
		.main-services h1 span{font-size:1.7em;}
		.main-services p, .facebook p{margin-bottom:1.5em;font-size:1.1em;}
		.facebook{background-position:top center;}
		@media(max-width:1000px){
			.main-services h1{line-height: 1em;}
		}
		@media(max-width:700px){
			.main-header.services h1 span, .main-header.services h2{font-size:12vw;}
		}

		/* Case Study */
		.case-study.main-header{background-position: bottom center;}
		.case-study.main-header{position: relative; overflow-y: hidden; padding-bottom:0; padding-top:25px;}
		.case-study.main-header .content-width{position: relative;}
		.case-study.main-header svg:not(.video-btn){position: absolute; bottom:50px; width:59%; fill:#431882;}
		.diagonal:before, .diagonal:after,
		.case-study:before, .case-study:after{content: ''; height:50px; height:150px; width:60%; background:white;  position: absolute;bottom:-75px; z-index:10;}
			/*diagonals*/
			.diagonal:before, .case-study:before{left:-5%; transform: rotate(5deg);}
			.diagonal:after, .case-study:after{right:-5%; transform: rotate(-5deg);}
		/*more-then-one-attorney-image*/
		#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study.main-header .content-width	{max-width:100%; width:100%;}
		#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .image-wrapper{width:75%; height:600px;}
		#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .image-wrapper img{max-width:100%; margin:0;}
		#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study  .case-study-content{position: absolute; top:200px; right:50px;}
		/*image column*/
		.case-study .content-width .image-wrapper{width:50%;}
		.case-study .content-width img.attorney{position: relative;z-index:1; max-height:500px; height:auto; width:auto; margin:0 auto; display: block;}
		/*title*/
		.case-study .case-study-content{text-align: right; z-index:10 !important;}
		.case-study .case-study-content p{text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; padding:0; letter-spacing: 2px; }
		@media all and (min-width:701px){
			.case-study .case-study-content h1{line-height: 65px;  position: absolute; width: 650px; top: -65px;right: 0;}
			.case-study .case-study-content p{position: absolute; top: 65px; right: 0;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:1150px){
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .case-study-content{position: initial !important; order:-1; width:100%; text-align: center; margin-top:100px;}
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .image-wrapper{width:100%; height:initial; margin-top:25px;}
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .case-study-content h1, 
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .case-study-content p{position: initial; width:100%;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:1000px){
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .case-study-content{margin-top:0;}
			.case-study .case-study-content h1{font-size:4em; }
			.case-study .case-study-content h1, .case-study .case-study-content p{text-shadow: 0px 0px 7px #000000; padding:0 25px;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:700px){
			.case-study .case-study-content h1{font-size:3em; line-height: 55px;}
			.case-study-content{position: absolute !important; bottom:125px;}
			.case-study .content-width img.attorney{max-height:450px; height:auto; max-width:100%;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:480px){
			.case-study .case-study-content h1{font-size:2em; line-height: 40px}
			#more-then-one-attorney-image.case-study .image-wrapper img{top:-25px;}
		}
		/*diagonals*/
		.main-header .content-width > div.diagonal-content{width:100%; text-align:center;}
		@media all and (max-width:1000px){
			.main-header.diagonal{padding:50px 25px 100px 25px;}
			.main-header.diagonal .content-width{padding:0;}
			.main-header h1, .main-header h2{font-size:4em;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:700px){
			.main-header h1, .main-header h2{font-size:3em;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:480px){
			.main-header h1, .main-header h2{font-size:2em;}
		}
		/*thank-you*/
		.main-header.thank-you{height:100vh; }
		.main-header .content-width > div:last-child.thank-you-content{width:100%; text-align: center; padding-left:15px; padding-right:15px;}
		.main-header.thank-you p{font-size:22px; max-width:800px; margin:0 auto;}
		@media all and (min-width:1001px){
			.main-header .content-width > div:last-child.thank-you-content{position: absolute; top:50%; transform: translateY(-50%); left:0; right:0;}	
		}
		@media all and (max-width:1000px){
			.main-header.thank-you{padding:0 15px 75px 15px; height:100%;}
			.main-header.thank-you h1, .main-header.thank-you h2{font-size:50px;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:480px){
			.main-header.thank-you h1, .main-header.thank-you h2{font-size:35px;}
			.main-header.thank-you p{font-size:18px;}
			.main-header.thank-you .outlined-btn.lets-talk{    font-size: 1rem; padding: .75em 1em .75em 1em;}
		}

		/*indv team*/
		.main-header.indv-team{height:100vh; background-position: center;}
		.main-header .content-width > div:last-child.indv-team-content{width:100%; text-align: center; padding-left:15px; padding-right:15px;}
		.main-header.indv-team h1{text-shadow: 0px 2px 2px #000;}
		.main-header.indv-team p{font-size:32px; max-width:800px; margin:0 auto; text-shadow: 0px 2px 2px #000;}
		@media all and (min-width:1001px){
			.main-header .content-width > div:last-child.indv-team-content{position: absolute; top:50%; transform: translateY(-50%); left:0; right:0;}	
		}
		@media all and (max-width:1000px){
			.main-header.indv-team{padding:50px 15px; height:100%;}
			.main-header.indv-team h1, .main-header.indv-team h2{font-size:50px;}
		}
		@media all and (max-width:480px){
			.main-header.indv-team h1, .main-header.indv-team h2{font-size:35px;}
			.main-header.indv-team p{font-size:18px;}
			.main-header.indv-team .outlined-btn.lets-talk{    font-size: 1rem; padding: .75em 1em .75em 1em;}
		}
	</style>
